_description: Miracle of the Virgin Mary: Boy slain by Jews for singing anthem — 152 lines in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
WOse loueþ wel vr LadiHeo wol quiten his wille wel
                    whi…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now Marie for þi Muchele mihtHelp vs to heuene þat
                    is so briht
